SEARCH
Package lubiku.castleQuest.Controller.Managers

Class GameWindowManager

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Controller.Managers.GameWindowManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurator
public class GameWindowManager extends Object implements Configurator

GameWindowManager

The `GameWindowManager` class manages the configuration of the game window. It implements the `Configurator` interface to enable it to be configured with JSON data.

    • configureJsonObject

      public void configureJsonObject(com.google.gson.JsonObject config)

      configureJsonObject

      Configures the `Application` with a JsonObject by setting it:
      • ORIGINAL_TILE_SIZE
      • SCALE
      • MAX_SCREEN_COLUMNS
      • MAX_SCREEN_ROWS
      • MAX_WORLD_COLUMNS
      • MAX_WORLD_ROWS
      • FPS
      Specified by:
      configureJsonObject in interface Configurator
      Parameters:
      config - The JsonArray containing the configuration data.
      See Also:
      • GamePanel

    • configureJsonArray

      public void configureJsonArray(com.google.gson.JsonArray config)

      configureJsonArray

      Configures the `GameWindow` with a JsonArray - NO USAGE
      Specified by:
      configureJsonArray in interface Configurator
      Parameters:
      config - The `JsonArray` containing the configuration data.
